message: All metadata fields for the indicator 5-a-2, translated into en
data: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls5.a Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control of land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and resources natural, in compliance with internal legislation5.a.2.Proportion of countries with a legal framework (including customary law) guaranteeing women the same rights as men in terms of access to ownership or control of landThis is to clarify that the country has a legal framework (including customary law) guaranteeing women the same rights as men in terms of access to ownership or control of land.Affirmation on the existence of the legal framework or notNot available
